Class ListController

  • java.lang.Object
    • communication.CommunicationAdapter
      • logic.ListController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Multicast, TCP, UDP

    public class ListController
extends CommunicationAdapter
    ListController class. Responsible for handling the files list updates. If there are changes, it changes the JList. Created by OmniBox on 29-11-2014.
